location.title: Placement of RSD Radar for Effective Use
items: Installed on the right side of the road – in the direction of traffic.
Mounted at a height of at least 2.5 meters above the road surface.

installation.title: Installation
description: The kit includes standard mounting brackets. RSD RADAR is easily installed on existing poles (e.g., lighting or power grid poles) using standard mounting brackets.
To connect, simply attach the device to a constant power source.

data.label: Output
data.value: RS485 and UART serial port (3.3V TTL level signal), data output format speed (baud rate 9600 bps, 9 bytes per frame data packet) illustrated.
